statements: SELECT staff_id, report_date, items_picked, items_packed FROM performance_reports;
SELECT items_packed, items_picked, staff_id, report_date FROM performance_reports;
SELECT staff_id, items_picked FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE items_packed > 50;
SELECT items_packed, report_date FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT staff_id, report_date, items_picked, items_packed FROM performance_reports WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, staff_id, items_packed, items_picked FROM performance_reports WHERE items_picked > 100 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT staff_id, SUM(items_picked) AS total_items_picked FROM performance_reports GROUP BY staff_id;
SELECT AVG(items_packed) AS avg_items_packed, MAX(items_picked) AS max_items_picked FROM performance_reports;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_staff;
SELECT staff_name, job_title FROM warehouse_staff WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, job_title FROM warehouse_staff ORDER BY job_title DESC;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, job_title, hire_date FROM warehouse_staff WHERE staff_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, job_title, hire_date FROM warehouse_staff WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_staff WHERE staff_name='John Doe';
SELECT staff_name, job_title, hire_date FROM warehouse_staff WHERE job_title='Manager';
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, job_title, hire_date FROM warehouse_staff ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT report_date, total_orders_completed, total_hours_worked FROM performance_reports WHERE staff_id=101 ORDER BY total_orders_completed DESC;
SELECT staff_name, job_title, hire_date, total_orders_completed, total_hours_worked FROM warehouse_staff JOIN performance_reports ON warehouse_staff.staff_id=performance_reports.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_staff;
SELECT name, position FROM warehouse_staff WHERE id = 1;
SELECT manager_id, name FROM staff_managers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE score > 80;
SELECT report_id, staff_id, report_date FROM performance_reports WHERE staff_id = 2 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_staff WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM warehouse_staff ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM warehouse_staff WHERE id IN (SELECT manager_id FROM warehouse_staff);
SELECT report_id, staff_id, report_date FROM performance_reports WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT manager_id, name FROM staff_managers WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY manager_id;
SELECT * FROM StaffInformation;
SELECT staff_name, department FROM StaffInformation WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, performance_rating FROM PerformanceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT staff_name, department, hire_date FROM StaffInformation WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT metric_id, total_orders FROM WarehouseMetrics WHERE total_orders > 100;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReports;
SELECT staff_id, report_date, performance_rating FROM PerformanceReports WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT staff_name, department FROM StaffInformation JOIN PerformanceReports ON StaffInformation.staff_id = PerformanceReports.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseMetrics WHERE total_orders > 100 AND average_processing_time < 10;
SELECT staff_id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM ShiftSchedule WHERE staff_id = 101 AND shift_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_staff ORDER BY staff_id DESC;
SELECT staff_name FROM warehouse_staff WHERE performance_rating > 3.5;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name FROM warehouse_staff WHERE staff_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_staff WHERE performance_rating < 2.0;
SELECT staff_name, performance_rating FROM warehouse_staff ORDER BY performance_rating;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_staff WHERE staff_id = 1
SELECT staff_name, performance_rating FROM warehouse_staff WHERE performance_rating > 4.5
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, performance_rating FROM warehouse_staff ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT staff_name AS Name, performance_rating AS Rating FROM warehouse_staff WHERE staff_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_staff FROM warehouse_staff
